title: Dominant Insurance and Financial Services Exports
description: In 2021, insurance and financial services made up 67.03% of Libya's service exports, one of the highest proportions globally.

title: High Bank Liquidity
description: Libya's bank liquid reserves to bank assets ratio was 214.12% in 2024, indicating a strong liquidity position.

title: Significant Total Reserves
description: In 2021, Libya's total reserves were equivalent to 36.81 months of imports, showcasing a robust reserve position.

title: Industrial Economy
description: Industry, including construction, contributed 77.34% to Libya's GDP in 2023, highlighting its industrial strength.

title: Oil-Dependent Economy
description: Oil rents accounted for 56.38% of Libya's GDP in 2021, reflecting its heavy reliance on oil.

title: Low Alternative Energy Usage
description: In 2020, alternative and nuclear energy made up only 0.01% of Libya's total energy use, one of the lowest globally.

title: Negative Savings Rate
description: Libya had a gross savings rate of -14.16% of GNI in 2020, indicating a negative savings trend.

title: Poor Logistics Infrastructure
description: Libya scored 1.7 on the logistics performance index for infrastructure quality in 2022, indicating poor infrastructure.

title: Low Rule of Law
description: In 2023, Libya's rule of law percentile rank was 0.94, reflecting a weak legal framework.
